Study the Hele-Shaw apparatus




Apparatus:

Hele-Shaw Apparatus Dye/Water
Streamlines Models Streamline around circular cylinder
Streamline around aerofoil Streamline around bluff body

Procedure

Flow Visualization with the Hele-Shaw

  1. Mount the Hele-Shaw apparatus in a vertical position.
  2. Place the model of interest ,which has the same thickness(1mm)as the slit,at middle of the test section.
  3. Fill the tanks with water and dye with the pinch cock closed.
  4. Open the pinch cock slowly,water and dye will start flowing the slit establishing a flow filled arround the rectangular model.
  5. Flow field with the dye streamlines flowing around the rectangular model may be photographed or sketched on a plain paper by projecting a light passing through the transparent sheet and making the image fall on paper placed on other side of the apparatus.
